product_name: Royal Robbins Mayan Sleeveless Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Could any shirt be more apt for your trip to the steamy Mayan Riviera than the women's Mayan Sleeveless Shirt from Royal Robbins? It's lightweight, wicking and quick drying so you stay cool and comfy. 100% polyester fabric resists wrinkles and offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UV rays. Ripstop construction makes the fabric highly durable and resistant to abrasions and tears. Moisture-control system pulls perspiration off your skin and helps it dry quickly. Yoke is mesh lined for airy comfort. Hidden pocket at hip is zippered for security. Royal Robbins Mayan Sleeveless Shirt for women features a subtle pattern and a shirttail hem with side vents for ease of movement. Closeout.
short_description: Could any shirt be more apt for your trip to the steamy Mayan Riviera than the women's Mayan Sleeveless Shirt from Royal Robbins? It's lightweight, wicking and quick drying so you stay cool and comfy.
